title: Looking for Bronze Player to Coach (Free/Unpaid)

embed.description: Welcome to the official channel of BurstFire. Subscribe for League of Legends VOD reviews, coaching sessions and more!

body:
Hey guys

I'm starting university in two weeks and to pass the time I'm going to be coaching one player from each tier on Skype, recording it and uploading it to my YouTube channel.

If you aren't sure what to expect from the coaching session its basically a VOD review or two and then a general Q+A afterward. If you are still a bit unsure click the link to go to my channel.

As you may have figured out from the title, this requires absolutely nothing from you except your time so I mean you don't really have anything to lose by doing it.

If you aren't interested then no hard feelings.

replies.body: I'm two placement games away from achieving bronze, do I qualify sensei? xD
Also, you're hell cute. Just throwing that out there.

well firstly, ty <3 and second yeah sure. its more about skill level than anything else. so if you were bronze last season or you think you are bronze this season then cool. just add me in game and message me :)
It is good that you understand what level your game is at and are willing to improve with the help of others.
